measured_by: ticket-shopping task / computer-based optimal stopping problem
justification: "We asked 129 participants to solve a computer-based optimal stopping problem following the ticket-shopping task described above," indicating that participants’ sequential decision behaviour was assessed through this task.
construct: sequential decision making / optimal stopping performance

measured_by: graphical histogram estimation task / average-value guessing task
justification: During the learning phase "participants encountered sequentially 50 ticket values… After every ten tickets, participants had to guess the average value… At the end of the learning phase participants were asked to complete a histogram," showing that these graphical tasks measured how well they learned the underlying value distribution.
construct: distribution learning / knowledge of option value distribution
